member.name: M:Application.Api.v1.GameServer.HostEndpoints.RegistrationGenerateNew(System.String,System.Guid,Application.Services.GameServer.IHostService,Application.Services.Identity.ICurrentUserService)
member.summary: Generates a new registration token to register a new host, the host must then use the registration URI to complete registration
member.param: A unique description of the host registration, intended to be a detailed identifier
ID of the account that will be the owner of this host
member.returns: Host ID, Key and full registration confirmation URI for the new host to complete registration

member.summary: Confirms and completes an active registration
member.param: Host ID and Key of a valid and active registration
member.returns: Host ID and Host Token for use when authenticating the host

member.summary: Generate a valid authorization token for use in host API endpoints
member.param: Valid and active Host ID and Host Key
member.returns: JWT with an expiration datetime in GMT/UTC
member.remarks: - Expiration time returned is in GMT/UTC

Timeframe of records to keep, any records older than this will be deleted
Options: - OneMonth - ThreeMonths - SixMonths - OneYear - TenYears
